How about the ONE card? üåö It's named that way so it has to be

actually UOB ONE card has minimum 3.33% cashback (equal to 2.22mpd) for ALL (except the usual exclusions) spending  so it is actually really almost THE ONE.don't think there is any miles card that can beat this for LOCAL SPENDING (all types whether Insert  Online  Paywave  or Applepay). Yes I know foreign currency spending there are 2.4mpd general spending cards. Nobody uses UOB One for foreign currency spending?!?!!UOB Visa Signature and UOB PPV are good competitors but they require you to pay using a specific type of payment modes only.
May I ask this 3.33% cash back is immediate or more like point accumulation and then redeem the cash back?
Hi all experts  for moomoo  can I know Fullerton SG fund also part of the bond fund?
u need to hit $2000 minimum spend every month for 3 months in a row.. then it is auto awarded in your statement  along with Specific Merchants bonus cashback of up to 6.67%
Hi guys.. noob question here. If I use Amaze+Citi rewards  can I clock miles for cash card top up?

need to fulfil $500/$1000/$2000 spending and min 5 transactions in each of all 3 statement months in qualifying quarter to get $50/$100/$200 quarterly rebate. Then need to have spending from 4th statement onwards for the rebate to offset the bill.

Nice details.Just to add  need to have spending from 4th statement onwards in the PRINCIPAL CARD HOLDER for the rebate to offset the bill.If Sub card spends  but principal card holder has $0 spend  the cash rebates will not appear (or only appear up to the principal card holder's spend).
All forms of top ups cannot right?
depend on mcc of the topup
Any link that indicates? I tried to google amaze mcc but can't find much

The original question is quote: "I go to a dining place  then I use amaze  it will convert to online transaction right? So it will be able to clock 4mpd for citi rewards?"Pairing AMAZE with CRMC will convert in-store purchase into online purchase and will get 4mpd  unless the MCC is excluded by CRMC.
amaze converts to online  amaze+citi rewards gets 4mpd so long mcc not excluded.
